text: unapar jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar karate rahe, usamen koee dosh nahin, jo (nishedhaagya se pahale) kha liya, jab ve allaah se darate rahe, eemaan par sthir rahe, satkarm karate rahe, phir darate aur satkarm karate rahe, phir (roke gaye to) allaah se dare aur sadaachaar karate rahe. allaah sadaachaariyon se prem karata[1] hai
